features.name: Homepage Weather Display
features.description: Display current weather and forecast for a default location on the homepage.

tasks.title: Create Homepage Route
tasks.description: Implement the '/' route using Next.js App Router.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/page.tsx. Use server-side rendering for SEO and fast load times.

tasks.title: Integrate WeatherCard Component
tasks.description: Display weather data using the WeatherCard component on the homepage.
tasks.technicalNotes: Import and use components/WeatherCard.tsx. Pass weather data as props.

tasks.title: Fetch Default Location Weather Data
tasks.description: Fetch weather data for the default location from the /api/weather endpoint.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js Route Handlers (app/api/weather/route.ts). Fetch data on the server.

features.name: Location Weather Details Page
features.description: Show detailed weather information for a selected location.

tasks.title: Create Location Details Route
tasks.description: Implement the '/location/[id]' dynamic route.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/location/[id]/page.tsx. Use server-side rendering.

tasks.title: Fetch Weather Data for Selected Location
tasks.description: Retrieve weather data for the selected location using the API.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use getServerSideProps or fetch in server components. Query /api/weather with locationId.

tasks.title: Render WeatherCard with Detailed Data
tasks.description: Display detailed weather data using the WeatherCard component.
tasks.technicalNotes: Pass full weather data object to WeatherCard. Consider showing hourly/weekly forecast if available.

features.name: Location Selection
features.description: Allow users to select a location to view weather information.

tasks.title: Implement LocationSelector Component
tasks.description: Build a UI component for selecting locations.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: components/LocationSelector.tsx. Use shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS for styling.

tasks.title: Integrate LocationSelector on Homepage
tasks.description: Add the LocationSelector to the homepage for user interaction.
tasks.technicalNotes: Update app/page.tsx to include LocationSelector. Handle selection events.

tasks.title: Update Global State on Location Change
tasks.description: Update the selected location in the global state when a user selects a new location.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use React Context API for state management. Provide context at app/layout.tsx.

features.name: Weather API Endpoint
features.description: Provide a backend API to fetch weather data for locations.

tasks.title: Implement /api/weather Route Handler
tasks.description: Create a Next.js API route to fetch weather data for a given location.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/api/weather/route.ts. Accept GET requests with locationId as a query parameter.

tasks.title: Integrate External Weather Data Source
tasks.description: Connect to an external weather API to retrieve real-time weather data.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use fetch or axios to call external APIs. Map external data to WeatherData entity.

tasks.title: Cache Weather Data In-Memory
tasks.description: Store fetched weather data in an in-memory store for quick access.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use a simple in-memory JS object or a library like node-cache. Invalidate cache as needed.

features.name: WeatherCard Component
features.description: Reusable component to display weather information for a location.

tasks.title: Design WeatherCard UI
tasks.description: Create a visually appealing card to display weather data.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: components/WeatherCard.tsx. Use Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for styling.

tasks.title: Accept Weather Data as Props
tasks.description: Ensure WeatherCard receives and displays all necessary weather data fields.
tasks.technicalNotes: Props: temperature, condition, forecastDate, location name, etc.

tasks.title: Add Loading and Error States
tasks.description: Handle loading and error scenarios within the WeatherCard.
tasks.technicalNotes: Show skeleton loaders or error messages as appropriate.

features.name: Responsive UI & Styling
features.description: Ensure the application is responsive and visually consistent.

tasks.title: Apply Tailwind CSS Utility Classes
tasks.description: Use Tailwind CSS for layout and responsive design.
tasks.technicalNotes: Follow mobile-first approach. Test on multiple device sizes.

tasks.title: Integrate shadcn/ui Components
tasks.description: Use shadcn/ui for consistent, accessible UI elements.
tasks.technicalNotes: Replace default HTML elements with shadcn/ui where appropriate.

features.name: Global State Management
features.description: Manage global state for selected location and weather data.

tasks.title: Set Up React Context Provider
tasks.description: Create a context provider for global state management.
tasks.technicalNotes: Wrap app/layout.tsx with context provider. Store selected location and weather data.

tasks.title: Consume Context in Components
tasks.description: Read and update global state in WeatherCard and LocationSelector.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use useContext hook in components. Trigger re-renders on state changes.

features.name: SEO Optimization
features.description: Optimize the application for search engines.

tasks.title: Set Meta Tags and Titles
tasks.description: Dynamically set page titles and meta descriptions based on location and weather.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js metadata API in page files.

tasks.title: Server-Side Rendering for All Pages
tasks.description: Ensure all pages use SSR for better SEO.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use server components and fetch data on the server.

features.name: Accessibility Improvements
features.description: Ensure the application is accessible to all users.

tasks.title: Add ARIA Labels and Roles
tasks.description: Enhance components with appropriate ARIA attributes.
tasks.technicalNotes: Follow WCAG guidelines. Use semantic HTML.

tasks.title: Keyboard Navigation Support
tasks.description: Ensure all interactive elements are navigable via keyboard.
tasks.technicalNotes: Test tab order and focus states. Use shadcn/ui accessibility features.
